name: Guarantid
description:
We created guarantid to help legitimate tenants rent on fair terms without discrimination. Renting in the UK is tough - tenants are required to  have a clear UK credit file, spend at least 40% of their income on rent, and have a good rental record in the UK. Without these tenants are asked to find a UK based Guarantor or to pay 6-12 months rent in advance. That’s unfair, so we created guarantid.

Guarantid is your ideal UK guarantor. With guarantid, tenants can rent their desired home, pay rent monthly, and avoid the burden of advance payment..

jobs.title: Guarantid Associate - Internship
jobs.description:
ABOUT GUARANTID

Are you a student looking for a flexible internship in a fast-growing Fintech startup?

Are you interested in gaining experience in the private sector whilst making a social impact?

Join us on our mission to bring about financial inclusion. Apply to become our new Guarantid Associate.

We created guarantid to help legitimate tenants rent on fair terms without discrimination. Renting in the UK is tough - tenants are required to have a clear UK credit file, spend at least 40% of their income on rent, and have a good rental record in the UK. Without these tenants, are asked to find a UK based Guarantor or to pay 6-12 months rent in advance. That’s unfair, so we created guarantid.

Guarantid is your ideal UK guarantor. With guarantid, tenants can rent their desired home, pay rent monthly, and avoid the burden of advance payment. 

We’re looking for a guarantid Associate Intern to help promote guarantid in UK Universities and bring about financial inclusion. 


If you love talking to people, building networks and have a confident, passionate approach then this role will be the perfect grounding to improve, perfect and develop those skills and earn.

THE OPPORTUNITY 

As part of your work at guarantid you will:

- Promote the  guarantid solution on your university campus, increasing 
  product and brand awareness amongst fellow students and university staff;
- Make the product accessible to all international students, staff members, 
  and others who are in need of guarantid;  
- Act as an on-site knowledge center, providing information about the product 
   and its benefits; 
- Research and identify market segments which can benefit most from 
   guarantid;
- Devise distribution strategies to capture the identified market segments on 
   your campus; 
- Manage and monitor a distribution funnel end-to-end, from prospect 
   identification to active consumers
- Identify and refer eligible students for guarantid 
- Create online and offline campaigns promoting guarantid  (e.g. digital 
   marketing, SEO, and on-campus events) 
- Conduct lecture shout outs and create networking events around the 
   campus / Student Unions as a spokesperson
- Collect feedback from targeted groups, and help improve the product and 
   its positioning based on customers needs  


THE IDEAL CANDIDATE 

- International postgraduate student at one of the universities listed below 
   studying Business / Finance, Social Sciences, Arts or Engineering;
- Multicultural with strong social empathy;
- Passionate about fintech/proptech and interested in making a social impact;
- Social and have an established network and relationships within the 
   academic community;
- Active and engaging on social media with a well-established online 
   presence and highly engaged network
- Passionate about building and growing relationships;
- Able to gather feedback, analyse data, and provide innovative insight;
- Professional, responsible, and person with a strong work ethic;
- A natural leader - tastemaker in his/her community, enthusiastic, confident 
   and positive
- Active member in Student Union or Societies 

IT WOULD BE COOL IF YOU ATTENDED ONE OF THE FOLLOWING UNIVERSITIES 

- University College London
- London School of Economics
- King’s College London
- City, University of London
- Imperial College
- University of Arts London

BENEFITS

- Internship in an award-winning Fintech Startup  
- Meaningful experience in a fast-growing dynamic company 
- Be part of a vibrant, dynamic, and creative entrepreneurial environment and 
   team
- Access the best and biggest Fintech hub in Europe
- Boost your CV;
- Gain a competitive commission structure 
- A chance to win amazing prizes like:
   - Deliveroo
   - Netflix
   - Spotify
   - Airpods
   - Xbox
jobs.descriptionHtml:
ABOUT GUARANTID

Are you a student looking for a flexible internship in a fast-growing Fintech startup?

Are you interested in gaining experience in the private sector whilst making a social impact?

Join us on our mission to bring about financial inclusion. Apply to become our new Guarantid Associate.

We created guarantid to help legitimate tenants rent on fair terms without discrimination. Renting in the UK is tough - tenants are required to have a clear UK credit file, spend at least 40% of their income on rent, and have a good rental record in the UK. Without these tenants, are asked to find a UK based Guarantor or to pay 6-12 months rent in advance. That’s unfair, so we created guarantid.

Guarantid is your ideal UK guarantor. With guarantid, tenants can rent their desired home, pay rent monthly, and avoid the burden of advance payment.

We’re looking for a guarantid Associate Intern to help promote guarantid in UK Universities and bring about financial inclusion.

If you love talking to people, building networks and have a confident, passionate approach then this role will be the perfect grounding to improve, perfect and develop those skills and earn.

THE OPPORTUNITY

As part of your work at guarantid you will:

  • Promote the guarantid solution on your university campus, increasing product and brand awareness amongst fellow students and university staff;
  • Make the product accessible to all international students, staff members, and others who are in need of guarantid;
  • Act as an on-site knowledge center, providing information about the product and its benefits;
  • Research and identify market segments which can benefit most from guarantid;
  • Devise distribution strategies to capture the identified market segments on your campus;
  • Manage and monitor a distribution funnel end-to-end, from prospect identification to active consumers
  • Identify and refer eligible students for guarantid
  • Create online and offline campaigns promoting guarantid (e.g. digital marketing, SEO, and on-campus events)
  • Conduct lecture shout outs and create networking events around the campus / Student Unions as a spokesperson
  • Collect feedback from targeted groups, and help improve the product and its positioning based on customers needs

THE IDEAL CANDIDATE

  • International postgraduate student at one of the universities listed below studying Business / Finance, Social Sciences, Arts or Engineering;
  • Multicultural with strong social empathy;
  • Passionate about fintech/proptech and interested in making a social impact;
  • Social and have an established network and relationships within the academic community;
  • Active and engaging on social media with a well-established online presence and highly engaged network
  • Passionate about building and growing relationships;
  • Able to gather feedback, analyse data, and provide innovative insight;
  • Professional, responsible, and person with a strong work ethic;
  • A natural leader - tastemaker in his/her community, enthusiastic, confident and positive
  • Active member in Student Union or Societies

IT WOULD BE COOL IF YOU ATTENDED ONE OF THE FOLLOWING UNIVERSITIES

  • University College London
  • London School of Economics
  • King’s College London
  • City, University of London
  • Imperial College
  • University of Arts London

BENEFITS

  • Internship in an award-winning Fintech Startup
  • Meaningful experience in a fast-growing dynamic company
  • Be part of a vibrant, dynamic, and creative entrepreneurial environment and team
  • Access the best and biggest Fintech hub in Europe
  • Boost your CV;
  • Gain a competitive commission structure
  • A chance to win amazing prizes like:
    • Deliveroo
    • Netflix
    • Spotify
    • Airpods
    • Xbox
